name: Heist (itch) (Daubalpi)
description:
Heist is a solo adventure 

You will be controlling four cops on a mission to catch some criminals (maybe more kill them than catch them). They are planning several heist and you are here to stop them ! 

Easy control but challenging level, many path are possible to succeed.

Just remember, We are stronger together ! 

Have Fun !! 

In game music in an original creation, Asset were found on the asset store (JMO assets, Polygon assets) Thanks you guys !!
